Name: Deliver Us From Evil (DUFE) - Masquerade
About the game: Deliver Us From Evil: Masquerade is a short and sweet BL visual novel with two POVs. Insecurities can bring out the worst in anyoneâ€”including Keldran and Ace, centuries-long friends with benefits. What starts off as a fun haunted house trip soon turns sinister, as they find themselves at the mercy of a ravenous spirit that wears their faces. If they cannot navigate their unspoken feelings and conquer their fears, they may find themselves as nothing more than silent spirits, wandering the halls forever.
